Activity: Last-minute preparations for the presentation. Organize all materials for quick access.
Conduct the meeting with the team to present the finalized layouts and reasoning behind designs.
Gather feedback from the meeting and note down any revisions or new ideas brought up by the team.
Implement new insights from the meeting into the level designs and prepare for next week’s tasks based on the feedback.
Send a summary email of the week’s progress and upcoming plans to the entire team.
Log out and reflect on the week’s work, identifying key successes and areas for improvement for next week.
